text: Ej mardum, in pajomʙar az coniʙi Parvardigoraton [hidojatu dini] haqro ʙarojaton ovardaast, pas, imon ʙijovared, ki ʙa xajr [-u saloh]-i sumost. Va agar [suxanasro napazired va] kufr ʙivarzed, [ʙidoned, ki] on ci dar osmonho va zamin ast, az oni Alloh taolo ast [va kufri sumo ʙar U zijone namerasonad] va Alloh taolo hamvora donoi hakim ast
